name: export

schema.title: Next Export
schema.description: Export a Next.js application. The exported application is located at `dist/$outputPath/exported`.

threads.description: Number of worker threads to utilize (defaults to the number of CPUs)

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

description: Export a Next.js application. The exported application is located at `dist/$outputPath/exported`.
